title: Lemon and parsley chicken escalopes
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) grated Cheddar cheese', '200g (7 oz) breadcrumbs', '200g (7 oz) plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 eggs, beaten', '4 chicken thighs, boned and flattened', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '7 tablespoons Dairygold', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
